pages.text: $(l)An extremely pure light magician who devoted his entire life to it, but one day, this huge and pure magic ball was snatched away by a group of monsters. At this point, this huge magic ball split into two parts, one turning into darkness and the other into the magic ball described here

pages.title: -white Orb-
pages.text: $(l)This item was discovered in the dungeon(Probability: 3.3%)
